headline: Can Expanded Aid Initiatives Deepen Exelon (EXC)'s Regulatory Partnerships and Customer Loyalty?
summary: ComEd, an Exelon company, recently partnered with the Community and Economic Development Association (CEDA) of Cook County to announce the opening of the new application period for Illinois' Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP), expanding eligibility to more households and offering diverse customer support measures. This development not only enhances energy affordability for vulnerable communities but also builds on ComEd's alignment with regional social initiatives,...
